name: Fly A Rope
description:
New adventures of a legendary city hero.
Meet new enemies with a variety of weaponry.
Unknown location with lots of hidden secrets.
Become a master of martial arts.
Combine your skills with extra powerful hits to outstand your foes.
Select the best guns in the shop, to dominate on the battle field.
Find military vehicles to become almost immortal.
Find yourself on the fields of battle glory.
